articles.title: Nifty 50, Sensex drop nearly 1% amid escalating tensions in Middle East; Nifty IT index fell 1.74% | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Indian equity markets decline amid unconfirmed reports of explosions in Iran, Iraq, and Syria, impacting stocks globally. Asian markets see significant losses. US Fed rate cut likelihood diminishes. Oil prices surge due to Middle East tensions. Gold prices ra…
articles.content: Indian equity markets witnessed a continued decline for the sixth consecutive trading session on Friday amidst unconfirmed reports of explosions in Iran, Iraq, and Syria. These reports emerged amid e… [+5700 chars]
